## âš™ï¸ Environment Setup

Create a new conda environment:

```bash
conda create -n {env_name} python={python_version} -y
```

Activate the environment:

``` bash
conda activate {env_name}
```
ğŸ“¦ Install Dependencies
```bash

pip install -r requirements.txt
```

```bash

{run_command}
```

```bash

pytest
```
